casebody.data:
NATIONAL LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, Appellant, v. BELL OIL & GAS COMPANY, Burk-Divide Oil Company, Consolidated, and Reno Oil Company, Appellee. No. 8438. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Dec. 6, 1937.

Before FOSTER, HUTCHESON, and HOLMES, Circuit Judges.

'PER CURIAM.

The petition for rehearing in the above numbered and entitled cause, 91 F.2d 509, is denied.
